auditoriums.name: Dr. B. R. AMBEDKAR HALL
auditoriums.description: A spacious auditorium with a capacity of 200, located in the Faculty of Social Work. It is equipped with a projector, sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning, making it ideal for large conferences, seminars, and meetings.

auditoriums.name: Deep Auditorium
auditoriums.description: This 150-capacity auditorium located in the Faculty of Commerce offers modern amenities including a projector, sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. Itâ€™s perfect for smaller gatherings and workshops.

auditoriums.name: Mcom Auditorium
auditoriums.description: Located in the Faculty of Commerce, this 300-capacity auditorium comes with extra features like stage lighting in addition to standard amenities. It's a great venue for larger events such as conferences and performances.

auditoriums.name: M.K Amin Auditorium
auditoriums.description: Located in M.K Amin Padra, this intimate 120-capacity auditorium offers essential amenities like sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. Ideal for smaller events and gatherings.

auditoriums.name: DR. Mrunalinidevi Puar Auditorium
auditoriums.description: Located in the Faculty of Family Community Science, this 250-capacity auditorium is equipped with a projector, sound system, Wi-Fi, AC, and stage lighting, offering a great space for a variety of events.

auditoriums.name: ILG MDC Auditorium
auditoriums.description: A large 350-capacity auditorium located in the Faculty of Management Studies. It features premium amenities like VIP seating, stage lighting, and modern audio-visual equipment, making it perfect for high-profile events.

auditoriums.name: Pandit Deendayal Upadhyay Auditorium
auditoriums.description: Located in the Faculty of Management Studies, this 400-capacity auditorium offers state-of-the-art facilities including a green room, stage lighting, and VIP seating. It's perfect for larger events and conferences.

auditoriums.name: Sir M. Visvesvaraya Auditorium
auditoriums.description: A 180-capacity auditorium in the Faculty of Technology and Engineering, equipped with a projector, sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. It is ideal for medium-sized conferences and seminars.

auditoriums.name: Chemical Auditorium
auditoriums.description: This 220-capacity auditorium is located in the Faculty of Technology and Engineering and comes with a projector, sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning, making it an ideal space for educational events.

auditoriums.name: C C Mehta Auditorium
auditoriums.description: This large 500-capacity auditorium located in the Faculty of Commerce is equipped with a projector, sound system, Wi-Fi, AC, stage lighting, green room, and VIP seating, making it perfect for prestigious events.
